data.name: ArgumentIsNullOrWhitespace
data.value: The argument '{0}' cannot be null, empty or contain only white space.

data.value: Records were updated, but the values were not retrieved back. See internal error for more details.

data.value: SqlCeCommand.CommandTimeout does not support non-zero values.

data.value: Parameter '{0}' is not valid. String arguments cannot be empty.

data.value: The connection given is not of type '{0}'.

data.value: The provider manifest given is not of type '{0}'.

data.value: The provider returned null for the informationType '{0}'.

data.value: Could not determine store version; a valid store connection or a version hint is required.

data.value: DATEPART argument to function '{0}.{1}' must be a literal string

data.value: '{0}' is not a valid value for DATEPART argument in '{1}.{2}' function

data.name: NiladicFunctionsCannotHaveParameters
data.value: Functions attributed as NiladicFunction='true' in the provider manifest cannot have parameter declarations

data.name: UnknownExpressionType
data.value: '{0}' is an unknown expression type.

data.name: FullOuterJoinNotSupported
data.value: FULL OUTER JOIN is not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: CollateInOrderByNotSupported
data.value: COLLATE subclause in the ORDER BY clause is not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: DMLQueryCannotReturnResults
data.value: Server-generated keys and server-generated values are not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: SkipNotSupportedException
data.value: SKIP clause is not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: WithTiesNotSupportedException
data.value: WITH TIES subclause is not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: UserDefinedFunctionsNotSupported
data.value: User defined functions are not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: TVFsNotSupported
data.value: Table valued functions are not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: DistinctAggregatesNotSupported
data.value: DISTINCT attribute is not supported in aggregate functions by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: ProviderDoesNotSupportType
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: NoStoreTypeForEdmType
data.value: There is no store type corresponding to the EDM type '{0}' of primitive type '{1}'.

data.name: StoredProceduresNotSupported
data.value: Stored procedures are not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: FunctionNotSupported
data.value: The function '{0}' is not supported by SQL Server Compact.

data.name: UpdateStatementCannotBeGeneratedForAcquiringLock
data.value: Failed when preparing table {0} for write as write-consistency cannot be guaranteed. Try adding a writable column to the table.

data.name: Update_NotSupportedServerGenKey
data.value: Server-generated keys are only supported for identity columns. More than one column is marked as server generated in table '{0}'.

data.name: Update_NotSupportedIdentityType
data.value: Server-generated keys are only supported for identity columns. The column '{0}' has type '{1}', which is not a valid type for an identity column.

data.name: ADP_InternalProviderError
data.value: Internal .NET Framework Data Provider error {0}.

data.value: The {0} enumeration value, {1}, is not valid.

data.value: The {0} enumeration value, {1}, is not supported by the {2} method.

data.name: ADP_InvalidConnectionOptionValue
data.value: Value is not valid for key '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidConnectionTypeException
data.value: The parameter specified for the connection is not supported and is not of the SqlCeConnection type.

data.name: ComputedColumnsNotSupported
data.value: The store generated pattern 'Computed' is supported for properties that are of type 'timestamp' or 'rowversion' only.

data.name: IncompleteDatabaseCreation
data.value: The database creation succeeded, but the creation of the database objects did not. See inner exception for more details.

data.name: ServerGeneratedGuidKeyNotSupported
data.value: Server generated GUID column "{0}" cannot be part of the key.

data.name: DeleteDatabaseNotAllowedWithinTransaction
data.value: Database file cannot be deleted within a transaction scope.

data.name: CreateDatabaseNotAllowedWithinTransaction
data.value: Database file cannot be created within a transaction scope.

data.name: DeleteDatabaseWithOpenConnection
data.value: Database file cannot be deleted. Close all open connections before calling DeleteDatabase().

data.name: ColumnGreaterThanMaxLengthNotSupported
data.value: {0} column with MaxLength greater than {1} is not supported.
